Overwatch 2 just isn't good. The original Overwatch was better, and even then, I'd rather play Paladins.

I preordered OW1. Probably put in over 1,000 hours in it. It was alright.

I preordered OW2. On the original promise of the PvE mode. Instead of getting what we were promised, we got:
- Watered down PvE mode that didn't even launch with the game
- No free way to unlock skins
- Skins from OW1 you didn't get are now locked behind expensive purchases
- A very grindy and unfun battlepass, that doesn't even last long (~63 days instead of the usual ~90)
- Heroes locked to battlepasses
- Unneeded changes
- Broken promises

This game just really wants your money, and they don't hide it.

16年的夏天已经死了，教你如何一个好开局做烂。顺便说一句，这游戏我就没下，我直接SAM挂了几分钟就来差评了。老子16年买了国服和亚服双版本现在就是来喷你的。

在这款游戏你可以品味到以下要素：
1、我们拥有最牛逼的OWL联赛，所以你们民间联赛就不准办了（据了解是金额到一定数额就要暴雪批准）所以这个游戏我就没看过什么亲民的比赛，喜欢COD式大联盟吗，但是你是传说中的美国CF---Call of duty吗？
2、你能在这款游戏体会到什么叫做官方教你玩游戏，从原来6人自由阵容->每个英雄只能选1个->2-2-2-》1-2-2（？）期间还出现过：官方BAN某英雄一周两周的机制，一刀切真是太棒啦。
3、外挂泛滥的时候，你能体会到连平7把的优秀体验，只需要某个人一句话，对面xxx是不是开了，然后自然而然会有一堆人开始保平。至于老板车队也就算了。当然啦，游戏解决方法我觉得并不是什么封挂不封挂的，而是只要没人玩就没有挂了嘛。
4、OW2当年说，会专注做PVE内容。然后就把当年画的饼删差不多了。哈哈。现在PVE不是上线了吗，好好品鉴吧。之前那个技能树的饼有多远滚多远。
5、OW2最开始放出来的时候，民间玩不到，职业开始打个半年一年的。我活久见一款职业联赛自娱自乐玩半年一年的游戏。
6、你的好友麦克雷（McCree）已改名卡西迪（Cassidy）

你说的对，但是《守望先锋“归来”》是暴雪出品的免费团队动作射击游戏，游戏设定在光明的科幻未来，在这里，被选中的人将加入「守望先锋」，捍卫世界和平。你将扮演一位名为「守望先锋特工」的神秘角色，在自由的旅行中邂逅性格各异、能力独特的同伴们，和他们一起击败强敌，找回不想继续来的战友——同时，逐步发掘「黑爪」的真相。在第6赛季中，接受过太阳丝线强化改造的伊锐拉加入战斗，高级战令解锁超过80种新个性化物品以及做了四年依旧没有改变的PVE，立即开始体验吧！

这个世界需要更多英雄，我来你妈了个逼，你还是趁早倒闭吧。

当然是接受它的好意再把它杀了，卖了。

This game is pretty funny with it's jokes by requiring a Battle net account to play, having you pay 40$ for the Invasion Bundle, the fact that the Breast Milk Bandit is still on the loose, and the Bill Cosby shrine existing. This game is clearly made by "people" who love their fictional christian characters that will never do such explicit acts with one another while not minding real people being feed to the wolves. TF2 on the other hand was being up held by one person before the summer update who rumors have it was being a lone chad while getting the community involved in its updates but Overwatch 2 has a team of the most [strike]overworked & under payed[/strike] "Skillful" coders known to man working on this very game behind closed doors, take a wild guess which game ended up being more fun. (You're a smart reader, you know the answer.) TF2 (before most the members of the developer team where killed by the Guild of Calamitous Intent) created a mode called MvM which is an in depth PvE mode where you can upgrade a classes's weapons that had more character than the one note "heros" in OW2. Speaking of OW2, let's compare the PvE of that game...oh never mind. While the PvE for OW2 was dropped harder than my sorry of an excuse sister dropping her baby while being high off of marijuana, cosmetics in TF2 are pretty cheap and I can think of a cuple of good loudouts for all nine classes under $5 while OW2, you have to pay $15 PER character. Do I even have to say about the final verdict whether this game is worth your time and money? Oh I almost forgot, Quake 2 just released its remastered version by Nightdive studios and from what I've heard, it's pretty good!
